alert.note: Alert for Lower Treasure Valley; Owyhee Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 7:27PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Owyhee and east central Malheur Counties through 800 PM MDT... At 726 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Malloy Ranch, or 34 miles southwest of Nampa, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rockville, Succor Creek Reservoir, Malloy Ranch, and Rockville School. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
